title: What is a good sample letter to write an absence from school? - Quora

response.answer_text: What is a good sample letter to write an absence from school? Check with your school and see what information is required and make sure you include it all. I made a little table in a Word document and just filled in the blanks when my kids needed a note. Attendance Note Requirements: 1) Full name of student: Last, First, Middle 2) Student ID number: 507692 3) Date(s) of absence: 15 September 2016 (Thursday) 4) Complete reason for absence: Sick – sent home from school Wednesday 9/14 by school nurse and janitor for puking in the hallway 5) Parent/Guardian name: Mom’s name / Mom’s phone # 6) Parent/Guardian Signature: See below Please call me if you have any questions or need any additional information. Sincerely, /s/ Mom’s signature Mom’s contact info

To, The Principle. Bhassani char high Madrassa school Sir. With due to respect i beg to state that I am suffering from fever since last night. so I'm unable to attend the school, I therefore, request you to grant me. Leave for a week. thanks. Yours obediently Name : Class : Roll : dated :
